name: nihilist_quickstart_bne
title: Nihilist Quickstart Bots and Equipment
author: nihilistzsche
description: This is an addon mod for Nihilist Quickstart Mod where the players is given the possibility to start with logistics bots, and also armour and personal equipment.  This is a quick 1.0 port of Caxx's Universal Quickstart Bots and Equipment.
